room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: We had heard good things but were disappointed. The other people took over and my husband and I stood around while they played. We never saw have the stuff and 2 things appeared to be broken the guy said just skip it !

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: Patient 0 was an awesome room! I'm looking forward to going to the other rooms in the future!

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: Went for my birthday this weekend and it was a blast! So intricate and challenging! We did the Patient Zero room and will most definitely be back to try to others!

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: I had no idea what to expect. Had a blast!! Our group did Patient Zero and we are ready to return and try another room. I highly recommend Fort Wayne Escape Room. Staff was friendly and professional.

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: Super super fun. We went with 3 other couple friends and it was such a blast!!! So fun to see the guys get into it! I highly recommend. The room looked great, it was seriously challenging. And we figured it out and got out of the room just as our time ran out! Yay us!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: It was a great time! Very challenging. We went with two groups -- one that escaped the pirate room and another that came very close to escaping the patient zero room (if only we had one more minute). We're hoping to come back and try the larger room in a month or two!
